data.prayer: Father, send out evangelists who will challenge people like Peter who said, "Repent and be baptized, every one of you" in the state of Hồ Chí Minh, Vietnam.
data.verse: Peter replied, “Repent and be baptized, every one of you, in the name of Jesus Christ for the forgiveness of your sins. And you will receive the gift of the Holy Spirit.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Hồ Chí Minh, Vietnam
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Lord, make the 278,267 believers in Hồ Chí Minh to be brave and clear with the gospel to their 12,587,133 neighbors.
data.verse: So Paul and Barnabas spent considerable time there, speaking boldly for the Lord, who confirmed the message of his grace by enabling them to perform signs and wonders.

data.prayer: Father, we ask for 2,573 new simple churches in the state of Hồ Chí Minh, Vietnam. Place a simple church in every community of the 12,865,400 people living here.
data.verse: And blessed be His glorious name forever; And may the whole earth be filled with His glory. Amen, and Amen.

data.prayer: Jesus, please give the apostles in Hồ Chí Minh, Vietnam a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the state.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Lord, to the people of Hồ Chí Minh you say, "If you wait for Me, I will work on your behalf."
data.verse: For from of old men have not heard, nor perceived by the ear, neither has the eye seen a God besides you, who works for him who waits for him.

data.prayer: Father, put your Bible in the hands of the 11,555,167, who are far from you and live in this place.
data.verse: How can a young person stay on the path of purity? By living according to your Word. I seek you with all my heart; do not let me stray from your commands.

data.prayer: Jesus, please send your Spirit to Hồ Chí Minh, so they can have freedom.
data.verse: Now the Lord is the Spirit, and where the Spirit of the Lord is, there is freedom.

location.name: Hồ Chí Minh
location.cities_list: Ho Chi Minh City, Củ Chi, Cần Giờ, Nhà Bè, Quận Bảy
